textBox.richText: Zarra Studios has updated its seSales point of sale software for Mac OS X. This update includes the following enhancements: • Addition of Address Book synchronization. • Addition of Barcode scanning directly from an invoice. • Addition of QuickBooks invoice export. • Added time settings to the Discount window. • Discounts can now be set to start and stop at the hour and/or minute of a day. In addition, the following items were corrected: • Correction of an issue with Purchase Order printing. • Corrected an issue that allowed unposted purchase orders to receive shipments. • Corrected an issue with the URL being passed after an issue has been submitted. • Corrected an issue that allowed orphaned addresses to exist in the database. • Corrected an issue that prevented categories from being deleted. • Added warning to un-posted purchase order receipts. • Corrected resizing issue for purchase order receipts. • Update to search fields. All search fields should operate properly. • Correction to Discount window. Archived items are now filtered out. • Correction to vendor window, productIDs are now displayed correctly. • Correction to purchase orders, productIDs are now displayed correctly. • Vendor Management window resize issue corrected. • Corrected several inconsistencies with data updates. All windows except purchase orders and invoices should update in real time. • Corrected an issue with database updates when a customer has more than two words in their name. • Corrected an issue with employee counting that was causing an abnormal application termination. This update is free for all users.
